item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Tuesday, March 18, 2025 at 9:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. GIMP 3.0 Released (30 points | 12 comments)
2. Mitigating SourceHut's partial outage caused by aggressive crawlers (108 points | 90 comments)
3. Announcing Snix (34 points | 21 comments)
4. Can we consider self-promo discussion off-topic? (36 points | 15 comments)
5. The Atrocious State Of Binary Compatibility on Linux and How To Address It (18 points | 16 comments)
6. The Rhombus Programming Language (29 points | 4 comments)
7. HTTP/3 is everywhere but nowhere (26 points | 10 comments)
8. Password reuse is rampant: nearly half of observed user logins are compromised (16 points | 22 comments)
9. Introducing Intel® Advanced Performance Extensions (Intel® APX) (18 points | 5 comments)
10. Offline PKI using 3 YubiKeys and an ARM single board computer (10 points | no comments)
11. After 47 years, OpenVMS gets a package manager (VSP) (4 points | 3 comments)
12. Installing the sassc Ruby gem on a Mac. A debugging story (13 points | no comments)
13. Stop Using and Recommending React (2 points | 1 comment)
14. Wherein I Explain Why Emacs Is The Best Tool For WordPress (11 points | no comments)
15. Docs: Open-source collaborative notes, wiki, and documentation platform by the French government (142 points | 20 comments)
16. Extracting content from an LCP "protected" ePub (3 points | no comments)
17. How to Track and Document Known Issues Effectively in Software Projects (1 points | no comments)
18. Tiny Pointers (11 points | 1 comment)
19. I built myself a watch (20 points | no comments)
20. Slack: The Art of Being Busy Without Getting Anything Done (1 points | 2 comments)
21. Nginx Rejects Dark Mode Support For Error Pages (1 points | 1 comment)
22. Verifiability is the Limit (5 points | 4 comments)
23. The Calculated Typer (2 points | no comments)
24. What are you doing this week? (10 points | 32 comments)
25. Component Simplicity (1 points | no comments)
